name: mta-lirr-tracker
title: MTA/LIRR Tracker
description: Look up train departures and service alerts for MTA/LIRR.
author: kcole93

commands.name: finddepartures
commands.title: findDepartures
commands.subtitle: Find Train Departures
commands.description: Search for MTA/LIRR station departures and view favorites.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
